data.title: DOO!: A LOOK BACK AT THE FIRST 50 YEARS!
data.meta_description: ZOINKS! Hey there everyone, I’m doing something a little different this time because I will taking a look at the last 50 years of one of my all time favorite cartoon characters: “SCOOBY-DOO!”  First, lets take a look back at “SCOOBY’S” entire career [Please note that other than a few format and char
data.text:
SCOOBY-DOO!: A LOOK BACK AT THE FIRST 50 YEARS! - PART 1: THE COMPLETE T.V./FILM HISTORY - SO FAR!

ZOINKS! Hey there everyone, I’m doing something a little different this time because I will taking a look at the last 50 years of one of my all time favorite cartoon characters: “SCOOBY-DOO!”

First, lets take a look back at “SCOOBY’S” entire career [Please note that other than a few format and character changes and add-ons, the plot involving “BAD GUYS IN MASKS” or “REAL MM- MM- MONSTERS!” remains the same unless the series or film description says so! Also I will not be putting in any descriptions because it would take to much time, sorry!].

THE T.V. SHOWS:

“SCOOBY-DOO!, WHERE ARE YOU!” [1969-1970],

“THE NEW SCOOBY-DOO! MOVIES” [1972-74],

“THE SCOOBY-DOO! SHOW” [A.K.A.] “THE SCOOBY-DOO/DYNOMUTT HOUR” [1976-78],

“SCOOBY’S ALL-STAR LAFF-A-LYMPICS” [This show was later retittled “SCOOBY’S ALL-STARS” for it’s second season.] [1977-78],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND SCRAPPY-DOO” [1979-1980],

“THE RICHIE RICH/SCOOBY-DOO! SHOW” [1980-82],

[“AND SCRAPPY TOO!”]

“SCOOBY AND SCRAPPY-DOO/PUPPY HOUR” [1982-83],

[Sorry, this is the best quality image I can get for this show!]

“THE NEW SCOOBY AND SCRAPPY-DOO SHOW” [1983-84],

“THE NEW SCOOBY-DOO! MYSTERIES” [1984-85],

“SCARY SCOOBY FUNNIES” and “SCOOBY’S MYSTERY FUNHOUSE” [1984-86],

[No new episodes were created for these two particular “SCOOBY-DOO!” show titles. It was just four random reruns of segments from “THE RICHIE RICH/SCOOBY-DOO! SHOW”, “THE SCOOBY AND SCRAPPY-DOO/PUPPY HOUR”, “THE NEW SCOOBY AND SCRAPPY-DOO SHOW” and “THE NEW SCOOBY-DOO! MYSTERIES” all combined into a half-hour format.]

“THE 13 GHOSTS OF SCOOBY-DOO!” [1985],

“A PUP NAMED SCOOBY-DOO!” [1988-1991],

“WHAT’S NEW SCOOBY-DOO?” [2002-05],

“SHAGGY AND SCOOBY-DOO GET A CLUE” [2006-08],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: MYSTERY INCORPORATED” [2010-13],

“BE COOL, SCOOBY-DOO!” [2015] AND

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND GUESS WHO?” [2019-?]

THE T.V. SPECIALS:

“SCOOBY-DOO!: BEHIND THE SCENES” - A.K.A. - “THOSE MEDDLING KIDS: 25 HOURS OF DOO” [1998]

“THE SCOOBY-DOO! PROJECT” [1999],

“NIGHT OF THE LIVING DOO!” [2001],

“A SCOOBY-DOO! CHRISTMAS” [2002],

“A SCOOBY-DOO! HALLOWEEN” [2003],

“A SCOOBY-DOO! VALENTINE” [2005] AND

“LEGO SCOOBY-DOO!: KNIGHT TIME TERROR” [2015]

THE T.V./FILM CROSSOVERS AND CAMEOS [I wont name all the episodes because that would take too long.]:

Two episodes of “JOHNNY BRAVO: BRAVO DOOBY-DOO! AND ‘TWAS THE NIGHT”,

“SCOOBY-DOO” and “SHAGGY” made a cameo appearance in “LOONEY TUNES: BACK IN ACTION” complaining to actor MATHEW LILLARD (who played “SHAGGY”) about his performance in “SCOOBY-DOO!: THE MOVIE”. “SCOOBY” would drink potion that would transform him into “THE TASMANIAN DEVIL” in a scene from “SCOOBY-DOO 2: MONSTERS UNLEASHED”.,

[TOP, “SCOOBY-DOO” [VOICED BY FRANK WELKER] AND “SHAGGY” [VOICED BY THE LATE CASEY KASEM] talk to MATHEW LILLARD [the first live-action and the current voice of “SHAGGY”] in “LOONEY TUNES: BACK IN ACTION” [2003], AND BOTTOM, a shot of “SCOOBY” after being turned into “THE TASMANIAN DEVIL” [BOTH VOICED BY NEIL FANNING] in “SCOOBY-DOO 2: MONSTERS UNLEASHED” [2004].]

Two episodes of “THE GRIM ADVENTURES OF BILLY AND MANDY”,

One episode of “YIN YANG YO!”,

One episode of “DRAWN TOGETHER”,

Two episodes - and possibly more in the future - of “ROBOT CHICKEN”,

One episode of “SABRINA, THE TEENAGE WITCH”,

One episode of “HARVEY BIRDMAN, ATTORNEY AT LAW: SHAGGY BUSTED”,

“CARTOON NETWORK’S GOLDEN BETTY AWARDS WEEK” [1995 - SPECIAL T.V. EVENT]

and it’s seqeul: “THE 1ST 13TH ANNUAL FANCY ANVIL AWARDS SHOW PROGRAM SPECIAL: LIVE IN STEREO” [A.K.A. “THE FANCY ANVIL AWARDS” OR “THE FANCY ANVILS” - SPECIAL T.V. EVENT 2002 - “SCOOBY” was given “THE LIFETIME ACHEIVEMENT AWARD”! “DAPHNE” was also a presenter.],

[“SCOOBY” recieving his award at “THE FANCY ANVILS”.]

One episode of “BATMAN: THE BRAVE AND THE BOLD: BAT-MITE PRESENTS: BATMAN’S STRANGEST CASES” [This episode alludes to “THE NEW SCOOBY-DOO MOVIES” where “BATMAN” originally guest starred in. However with some meddling from “BAT-MITE” not only were “THE DYNAMIC DUO” able to fight unlike in the original appearance, but he also removed “SHAGGY” and “SCOOBY’S” cowardice allowing them to, for the first time, fight the villains toe to toe.],

[“SCOOBY-DOO!” and “BATMAN” team-up to beat-up “THE JOKER”!]

One episode of “THE LOUD HOUSE”,

“SCOOBY” and “THE MYSTERY INC. GANG” were parodied in an episode of “JOHNNY TEST”,

One episode of “OK K.O.!: LET’S BE HEROES”,

An alternate version of “LEGO VELMA” can be seen in “THE LEGO MOVIE 2: THE SECOND PART” [2019]

And the animated “SUPERNATURAL” crossover episode: “SCOOBYNATURAL”.

In the episode, “SAM”, “DEAN”, and “CASTIEL” are sucked into the animated world of “SCOOBY-DOO!” and must help the Scooby Gang solve a mystery when a real ghost crashes the events of the “SCOOBY-DOO, WHERE ARE YOU!” episode "A NIGHT OF FRIGHT IS NO DELIGHT".

THE MADE FOR T.V. AND DTV [DIRECT-TO-VIDEO] ANIMATED FEATURE-LENGTH FILMS:

“SCOOBY-DOO! GOES HOLLYWOOD” [AKA “SCOOBY GOES HOLLYWOOD”] [1979] [T.V.],

“SCOOBY-DOO! MEETS THE BOO BROTHERS” [1987] [T.V.],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE GHOUL SCHOOL” [1988] T.V.],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE RELUCTANT WEREWOLF” [1988] [T.V.],

“SCOOBY-DOO! IN: ARABIAN NIGHTS” [AKA “ARABIAN NIGHTS”] [1994] [T.V.],

“SCOOBY-DOO! ON ZOMBIE ISLAND” [1998] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE WITCH’S GHOST” [1999] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE ALIEN INVADERS” [2000] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE CYBER CHASE” [2001] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE LEGEND OF THE VAMPIRE” [2003] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE MONSTER OF MEXICO” [2003] [DVT],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE LOCH NESS MONSTER [2004] [DTV],

“ALOHA, SCOOBY-DOO!” [2005] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! IN: WHERE’S MY MUMMY?” [2005] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: PIRATES AHOY!” [2006] [DTV],

“CHILL OUT, SCOOBY-DOO!” [2007] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE GOBLIN KING” [2008] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE SAMURAI SWORD” [2009] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: ABRACADABRA-DOO” [2010] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: CAMP SCARE” [2010] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: LEGEND OF THE PHANTOSAUR” [2011] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: MUSIC OF THE VAMPIRE” [2012] [DTV],

“BIG TOP SCOOBY-DOO!” [2012] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: MASK OF THE BLUE FALCON” [2013] DVT],

“SCOOBY-DOO! ADVENTURES: THE MYSTERY MAP” [2013] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: STAGE FRIGHT” [2013] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: WWE WRESTLEMANIA MYSTERY” [2014] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: FRANKENCREEPY” [2014] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: MOON MONSTER MADNESS” [2015] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND KISS: ROCK AND ROLL MYSTERY” [2015] [DTV],

“LEGO SCOOBY-DOO!: HAUNTED HOLLYWOOD” [2016] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND WWE: CURSE OF THE SPEED DEMON” [2016] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: SHAGGY’S SHOWDOWN” [2017] [DTV],

“LEGO SCOOBY-DOO!: BLOWOUT BEACH BASH” [2017] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND BATMAN: THE BRAVE AND THE BOLD” [2018] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE GOURMET GHOST” [2018] [DTV],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE CURSE OF THE 13TH GHOST [2019] [DTV] AND

“SCOOBY-DOO!: RETURN TO ZOMBIE ISLAND” [2019] [DTV] [Not yet released.].

THE LIVE-ACTION THEATRICAL FEATURE-LENGTH FILMS:

“SCOOBY-DOO: THE MOVIE” [2002] and

“SCOOBY-DOO 2: MONSTERS UNLEASHED” [2004]

THE LIVE-ACTION MFT.V. [MADE FOR T.V.] DTV FEATURE-LENGTH PREQUEL FILMS:

“SCOOBY-DOO!: THE MYSTERY BEGINS” [2009] [MFT.V.],

“SCOOBY-DOO! THE CURSE OF THE LAKE MONSTER - EXTENDED EDITION” [2010] [MFT.V.]

[These four films can also be found in complete dvd and blu-ray movie collections.]

AND “DAPHNE AND VELMA” [2018] [DTV]

THE ANIMATED THEATRICAL FEATURE-LENGTH FILMS:

“SCOOB” [2020]

AND FINALLY THE DTV MINI-MOVIES:

[These films were included along with 12 other episodes of various “SCOOBY-DOO!” T.V. shows in separate dvd sets called “SCOOBY-DOO!: 13 SPOOKY TALES” with “SPOOKY GAMES” - the first one in the dvd series - going under a different name.]

“SCOOB-DOO!: SPOOKY GAMES” [“SCOOBY-DOO! LAFF-A-LYMPICS: SPOOKY GAMES”] [2012],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: HAUNTED HOLIDAYS” [“SCOOBY-DOO! 13 SPOOKY TALES: HOLIDAY CHILLS AND THRILLS”] [2012],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE SPOOKY SCARECROW” [“SCOOBY-DOO! 13 SPOOKY TALES: RUN FOR YOUR ‘RIFE”] [2013],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: MECHA MUTT MENACE” [“SCOOBY-DOO! 13 SPOOKY TALES: RUH-ROH ROBOT!” [2013],

“SCOOBY-DOO!: GHASTLY GOALS!” [“SCOOBY-DOO! 13 SPOOKY TALES: FIELD OF SCREAMS”] [2014] AND

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE BEACH BEASTIE” [“SCOOBY-DOO! 13 SPOOKY TALES: SURF’S UP, SCOOBY-DOO!”] [2015]

AH HAH! I tricked ya’ because I will also include all of the live stage shows as well:

“SCOOBY-DOO! IN: STAGEFRIGHT” [2001],

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE PIRATE GHOST” [2009],

“SCOOBY-DOO LIVE!: MUSICAL MYSTERIES” [2013] AND

“SCOOBY-DOO! AND THE LOST CITY OF GOLD” [2020]

Well fans I’m going to cut it off from here. next time we will go behind the scenes of our favorite cartoon canine! until then: TO BE CONTINUED….
